name: Cybertron Mission
overview: Cybertron Mission is a two-dimensional shooter game, developed by Matthew Bates and released by Micro Power (a.k.a. Program Power) in 1984 for the BBC Micro and Acorn Electron and later ported to the Commodore 64 in the same year. The game is heavily influenced by the 1982 Atari 8-bit computer game Shamus, which was itself inspired by the 1980 arcade game Berzerk.
